metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6062 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The dissect_rtcp_app function in epan/dissectors/packet-rtcp.c in the RTCPdissector in Wireshark 1.6.x before 1.6.12 and 1.8.x before 1.8.4 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a craftedpacket.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6062` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwireshark11 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwiretap8 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwscodecs2 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwsutil9 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
tshark - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark-common - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark-gtk - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark-qt - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wireshark package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.1+g01b65bf-2').
